hero.title: Exclusive Features
hero.subtitle: Built from the ground up for Apple Vision Pro

panoramic.title: Panoramic Curved View
panoramic.description: Experience up to 4 pages at once in an immersive, curved view that surrounds you. This exclusive feature brings your comics to life like never before, allowing you to see more of the story at once.

virtualShelf.title: 3D Interactive Virtual Shelf
virtualShelf.description: Place a 3D virtual shelf in your space and organize your comics visually. Browse your collection as if you were standing in front of a real bookshelf, bringing the physical comic experience into VR.

multiComics.title: Multiple Comics Simultaneously
multiComics.description: Dive into different worlds without leaving your current adventure behind. Open multiple comics at once and switch between them seamlessly, perfect for reference or comparing stories.

environments.title: Free 360° Environments
environments.description: Choose from a variety of immersive backgrounds to enhance your reading experience. From cozy libraries to futuristic spaces, find the perfect setting for your comic adventure.

readingModes.title: Flexible Reading Modes
readingModes.description: Read in single or double page format based on your preference. Images in wide aspect ratio are automatically corrected to appear properly in 2-page mode.

mangaSupport.title: Manga Support
mangaSupport.description: Enjoy Japanese manga with proper right-to-left reading support. Splash Reader automatically detects and adjusts the reading direction for an authentic experience.

organization.title: Smart Organization
organization.description: Organize comics by folders to keep your collection neat and accessible. Find what you want to read next without hassle.

progressSaving.title: Auto Progress Saving
progressSaving.description: Splash Reader saves your progress automatically, allowing you to pick up right where you left off every time you return.

pageCorrection.title: Double Page Spread Correction
pageCorrection.description: Add placeholders to correctly display double page spreads, ensuring you see the artwork as the creator intended.

gestureControls.title: Intuitive Controls
gestureControls.description: Flip pages using hand gestures or tap on the page. Navigation feels natural and effortless in VR.

overview.title: 360° VR Environments
overview.description: Choose the perfect backdrop for your comic reading adventures. Splash Reader offers a variety of immersive environments that enhance your reading experience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Which formats does Splash Reader support?
faq.a1: Splash Reader supports all popular digital graphic novel formats including CBR, CBZ, and PDF.
faq.q2: Can I use Splash Reader on devices other than Apple Vision Pro?
faq.a2: Currently, Splash Reader is exclusively designed for Apple Vision Pro running VisionOS.
faq.q3: How many comics can I read simultaneously?
faq.a3: You can open multiple comics at once, allowing you to switch between different titles seamlessly.
faq.q4: Does Splash Reader work with manga?
faq.a4: Yes, Splash Reader supports right-to-left reading for manga.
faq.q5: Where can I get help if I have a problem?
faq.a5: You can contact our support team via email at support@splashreader.com or join our Discord community for assistance.
